Description: 2 Bedroom 1 Bathroom Level: 1st Floor Pets: No Pets Parking: Street Parking Laundry: Coin-operated Laundry In Basement Broker Fee: Applicant Pays Full Broker Fee Utilities: Tenants Pay For Gas and Electricity Available: September Gorgeous apartment on an adorable side tree-lined street!
